title: Allahabad HC bail to students in T20 World Cup case: ‘Unity of India not a reed that can bend to slogans’ - The Indian Express
content:
1. Allahabad HC bail to students in T20 World Cup case: ‘Unity of India not a reed that can bend to slogans’  The Indian Express
  2. Indias Unity Not Made Of Bamboo Reeds Which Will Bend To Passing Winds Of Empty Slogans: Allahabad HC...  Live Law - Indian Legal News
  3. ‘Our unity not made of bamboo reeds’: Judge gives bail to 3 Kashmiri students  Hindustan Times
  4. Allahabad High Court grants bail to 3 Kashmiri students arrested on sedition charge  Zee News
  5. Allahabad HC grants bail to 3 Jammu & Kashmir students jailed for raising pro-Pak slogans  Times of India
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Arsheed Yusuf, Inayat Altaf Sheikh and Showkat Ahmed Ganai have spent the past five months in the Agra District Jail, after they were arrested on October 26 for comments made following Pakistan's victory over India.
